short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the Wikipedia user interface to the beautiful old vector layout. Is also applied to the other international Wikimedia pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension simply changes Wikipedia interface to the beautiful old vector layout by adding "?useskin=vector" to the end of each HTTP request. It is also applied to the other international Wikimedia pages.
